paragraphs.body: The Fire Sages is a group of users dedicated to the quality improvement of canon articles to make them ${link_0}, and also the improvement of A-class articles so they can be ${link_1}. The group is not only focused on rewriting the article, but also on the addition of new information, so that it displays the quality standards that are needed to have the Crown Prince headpiece icon.
paragraphs.text: The Fire Sages is a group of users dedicated to the quality improvement of canon articles to make them A-class, and also the improvement of A-class articles so they can be featured. The group is not only focused on rewriting the article, but also on the addition of new information, so that it displays the quality standards that are needed to have the Crown Prince headpiece icon.

paragraphs.body: An article is chosen every fortnight. During that two week period, only the selected article is edited and improved by the user group until it is finished.
paragraphs.text: An article is chosen every fortnight. During that two week period, only the selected article is edited and improved by the user group until it is finished.

paragraphs.body: If the group sees that the article has been successfully improved, then a member can nominate it to be A-class and let the ${link_0} make the decision.
paragraphs.text: If the group sees that the article has been successfully improved, then a member can nominate it to be A-class and let the Standards Council make the decision.

paragraphs.body: If you would like to join the Fire Sages, please visit the ${link_0} page.
paragraphs.text: If you would like to join the Fire Sages, please visit the membership requests page.
